body.name: Flushable Wipes for Baby and Kids by Kandoo,Sensitve and Unscented Formula, Hypoallergenic Potty Training Wet Cleansing Cloths, 100 Count Tub, Pack of 2

features: Flushable Wipes: These wipes are designed to be flushable for easy disposal.
Sensitive Skin Formula: The wipes are formulated to be gentle on sensitive skin.
Whole Body Use: These wipes can be used on the entire body for all-over cleanliness.
Kandoo Brand: These wipes are from the Kandoo brand known for quality baby products.
2 Tubes of Wipes: Each package contains 2 tubes of wipes for a total of 200 wipes.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #13,980 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #121 in Diaper Wipes & Refills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yup! We have a winner!!!
reviews.reviewText: Ok… so I heard about the septic system rants about not flushing baby wipes but with two GrandBunnies, under 5 what else is there?!? From messy hands to bum needs, what are you to do?!? So, while shopping, I accidentally picked up one of these and decided to just give it a try. Boy, was I impressed! I was immediately hooked! They are the right size for little hands and two wipes cleans typical bums, really well… AND YOU CAN FLUSH THEM!!! Whoopee! Cute containers too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST WIPE DISPENSERS and WIPES EVER!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing wipes but the wipe dispensers are incredible!SO MUCH BETTER THAN HUGGIES OR PAMPERS WIPE DISPENSERS!There is a grippy rubber around the spot where you pull the wipes out, so it catches each wipe... you don’t have the constant issue of having to open the box and get the wipes pulling as they should again. There is also a rubber grippy on the bottom of the box so it doesn’t slide around the tile floor. The button is large and makes it easy for kids to open. When closing it is also simple because there is a rubber grip that holds the lid closed tight so you don’t have to worry about wipes drying out.The boxes also came with cute, high quality groggy stickers so the kids can enjoy customizing their own box. They loved this and it encouraged my 2 year old to try to potty train!These containers are the absolute best.(I swear I wasn’t asked to write a review and I’m getting nothing in return for this)I was going on and on about how impressed I was with these wipe dispensers that my husband laughed and told me to write a review lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the job done
reviews.reviewText: Get the job done and not so thick that I'm worried it'll clog my toilet. Kids can decorate the container.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good wipes, bad container lid
reviews.reviewText: The wipes are great. Have been using the refills for long time. The dispenser is good size, fits well on top of toilet lid. But the dispenser's Lid is a very bad design -- it locks fine, but it does not spring out to open at all. You have to use your fingers to pry it to open. Defeats the point - you have dirty hands touching the lid trying to get what you need to get.... The pack of two containers - and both lids are not going to pop open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for kids!
reviews.reviewText: Great deal. I don’t have small children, but I prefer these wipes over Cottenelle and other brands because I have very sensitive skin. This was a really good deal, as it comes with 2 containers and 4 packs of 50 wipes. My only dislike is that the opening is much larger than Cottonelle and other brands that aren’t made for children. I can see where this would be helpful for children, but for me I have to tuck the wipe back into the plastic package to keep it from drying out, and even then if there’s a bit of time between uses (I would say anything over an hour) the next wipe is at least somewhat dry.I also prefer to be able to completely remove the wipes from the plastic package and put them directly in the container, and I haven’t tried doing this, but I feel that they would dry out quickly if I were to do this, because the only way I keep the “next” wipe from drying is to tuck it in to the plastic package inside the container.Still, I’ve used Cottonelle for years, and I definitely prefer these wipes for my own use over those or any other brand I’ve tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The new boxes are more elegant than the last ones. I'm more comfortable having one on display now.Our family has used these wipes since our kids were first toilet training. They're teens now. I've always prefered these wipes as my skin is very sensitive, as is my nose. The wipes don't affect either adversely. In fact, I've even used these to remove makeup while camping and making sure all body parts were clean. My skin never reacted poorly; it actually looked good. The scent is light and pleasant, barely there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wipes are good
reviews.reviewText: The wipes are great! However, if you don’t cover the wipes back with the seal sticker, they dry out. So, when you put the wipes in the container, you have to open the whole container to open the package of wipes otherwise the wipes are dry. So the container is useless. I would recommend the wipes but skip the container.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The dispensers work great and are easy for young kids to use
reviews.reviewText: I really don't know why so many people are reviewing the dispenser so badly. It's great. It's simple and both my 4 year old and 2 year old are able to open it easily and, most importantly, they can close it so the wipes don't dry out. I'm very happy with both the dispensers and the wipes themselves.
I like the dispensing box, very practical, but the wipes aren't interlocked so they only come out individually. Not very efficient form my son to pull them out.
